text.text_translated:
Employees are people who work for a company.  
Girox Foods should use a people-oriented management style.  
We should explore ways to offer flexible working hours.  
We should consider how to let employees work from chosen places.  
Managers need to challenge staff in different ways.  
Managers need to give positive reinforcement and recognition for work.  
Girox Foods should invest more in professional development.  
They are going to focus on social and intercultural communication.  
This can help make a positive work environment.  
Then employees can do their best work.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Employees are people in a company.  
We think managers at Girox Foods should put people first.  
We should look for ways to give employees flexible working hours.  
We should consider how employees can work from the place they choose.  
We should consider ways for managers to give staff tasks and praise.  
We should spend more money on training.  
This training should teach social skills.  
It should also teach how to talk with people from other cultures.  
This can help make a positive work environment.  
Then employees can do their best work.
